1252500.name: Vault: Tomb of the King Demo
1252500.description:
"Vault: Tomb of the King is Zelda but Trine, or Trine but Zelda: it's basically a big dungeon filled with puzzle spaces."
-PC Gamer Magazine

For years, adventurers have entered King Allard's tomb in search of the fabled treasure locked inside. None have been successful, until now.

  • Dynamically switch between three heroes to overcome deadly traps, enemies and puzzles.

  • Purchase new items and upgrade your abilities to improve your chance of survival.

  • Enjoy challenging hand crafted levels and puzzles that will test your wits and dexterity.

  • Experience an engaging story and uncover the truth about King Allard's Tomb.
1252500.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
*具有完全音频支持的语言
